name: Free Dynamic Meditation
tag_list: energy, meditation, pranic, healing, healer, egypt, tai, chi, mind, body, clean, aura, chakras, love, helper, knowledge, relax, fresh, health, observation, touch, learn, trainer
overview:
The Energy Meditation will lead you to know how to OBSERVE ,and Observation will lead you to the AWARENESS , and AWARENESS will ask your MIND and HEART for the WAY out , and When you Mind and Heart give the Solution , you get then a KNOWLEDGE so here it is goes , Observation teach us how to be Aware and Awareness lead us to Healing and Healing give us a little idea about our self which is Self Knowledge. This is my paradigm in teaching for Meditation.
